data.title: UNOOSA
meta_keywords: United Nations Office Outer Space Affairs UN
data.meta_description: United Nations Office for Outer Space Affairs
data.text:
Space4SDGs

See UNOOSA's brochure to understand how space technology and its myriad applications play an important role in supporting the 17 Sustainable Development Goals (SDGs) established under the 2030 Agenda for Sustainable Development.

Read more

Access to Space for All

Access to Space for All enables communities from all over the world to use and benefit from space technologies and applications thanks to the cooperation among established space actors, the United Nations and non or emerging space entities.

Read more

UNOOSA Annual Report 2023

For UNOOSA, 2023 was an eventful year of building capacities, advancing gender equality, facilitating space sustainability, enhancing disaster preparedness, raising awareness of the benefits of space and promoting cooperation in space activities. Discover more in the latest Annual Report.

Read more
